title: Toaru Majutsu no Index II (Dub)
alternative_title: とある魔術の禁書目録II; Toaru Majutsu no Index 2; A Certain Magical Index 2; Toaru Majutsu no Kinsho Mokuroku 2
description: Index is still a fugitive and many powerful Magical organizations and individuals want to take her to use the books in her memory eliminating her in the process. War between those organizations is also starting to emerge. Index can only rely on her friend Touma who has always protected her along with Misaka and other friends from the Academy.
